basic.name: Magic Missiles (Q)
basic.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

basic.name: Arcane Orb (W)
basic.description: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to 270 more damage.

heroic.name: Disintegrate (R)
heroic.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

heroic.name: Wave of Force (R)
heroic.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 damage.

trait.name: Critical Mass (T)
trait.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.

1.name: Prodigy
rewards: {highlight}6 takedowns: Critical Mass restores Li-Ming 10% Maximum Mana.{/highlight}
{highlight}12 takedowns: Increase arcane Orb's damage for distance traveled by 30%.{/highlight}
{highlight}18 takedowns: Hitting enemy heroes with 3 magic missiles does extra 87 damage.{/highlight}

1.name: Aether Walker
1.description: Teleport costs no Mana.  If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.  Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.

1.name: Power Hungry
1.description: Regeneration Globes {highlight} and fountains {/highlight} restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

4.name: Magic Weapon
4.description: {highlight}Li-Ming's basic attacks deal magic damage and ignore armour. Hitting enemy heroes recently hit by a Magic Missile restores 25 mana{/highlight}

4.name: Triumvirate
4.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and 40 Mana is refunded.

4.name: Dominance
4.description: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

7.name: Diamond Skin
7.description: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

7.name: Mocking image
7.description: {highlight}Teleport will leave a Li-Ming Decoy with 100% of Li-Ming current health, that decoy will last 1 second. After being destroyed or expiring it will stun close enemy units for 0.5 second{/highlight}

7.name: Calamity
7.description: Teleport does 300 damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

10.name: Disintegrate
10.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

10.name: Wave of Force
10.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 damage.

13.name: Illusionist
13.description: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed. This effect has a 4 second cooldown.Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

13.name: Seeker
13.description: {highlight}Li-Ming's basic attacks mark enemy heroes. Magic Missiles will follow the marked hero from when they were created.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Magic Missiles now pierce through non-heroic targets.{/highlight}

13.name: Glass Cannon
13.description: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 20%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

16.name: Mirrorball
16.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

16.name: Arcane Orbit
16.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from 270 to 371.

16.name: Force Armor
16.description: {highlight}When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor, reducing the damage taken by the next Ability by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast and store up to 4 charges. {/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Basic attacks creates one Magic Missile on the direction of the target.{/highlight}

20.name: Temporal Flux
20.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

20.name: Repulsion
20.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
20.description: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by 5%, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

20.name: Archon: Pure Power
20.description: {highlight}Activate to enter Archon form for 6 seconds, during that time Magic missiles will travel 35% faster and Arcane Orb will pull enemies to the center when hit but Li-Ming will be unable to cast teleport during that time.{/highlight}
